snippet.title: Silent Sonata - Game Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
A BRAND NEW HORROR EXPERIENCE COMING TO PC SOON. 


Centuries-old whispers speak of demons that thrive on the creativity of mankind. One of these ancient entities, Dantalion, is said to govern the arts, feeding off the creativity and souls of unwitting individuals. When a reoccurring Dream finally comes true during a piano performance at the coveted Thaddaeus Opera House, Deonte has to learn quickly that his new reality is really the nightmare world he has heard whispers about. 


The game explores the thin veil between inspiration and possession, creativity and corruption. It delves into the unsettling notion that the most beautiful melodies could be tainted by a darkness that transcends time. As players navigate this chilling narrative, they confront not just the demon within the game but the lingering echoes of malevolence that may still resonate in real-world history.






Features:


Immersive Graphics: AAA-quality graphics give players a terrifying world to explore and experience.
Multi-Leveled Puzzles and Challenges: Many different gameplay loops including - Stealth based Horror, Platforming elements, Puzzles, Challenges & Boss Fights
Twitch Chat Intergration: Streamers can allow Chat to control  a limited amount of environmental effects, ranging from sounds, to jumpscares & more.  
Lore: A Story Rich game with cutscenes, optional side quests & even maybe even an Alternative ending ;D
OST: Original Sound track from Brightside Movement
